sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"希望，期待"之意。
means: hope ： 指希望得到积极、有利的结果，所期待的可能实现，也可能不会实现。
anticipate ： 指对未来的期望，一般是对好事的期待。
await ： 书面用词，指对将要或预料要发生的事怍于期待状态。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"等，等待"之意。
means: wait ： 普通用词，侧重静候于某处，直到等候或期待的人或事物的到来，通常用作不及物动词，与for连用。
await ： 正式用词，及物动词，通常指不断等待，多含耐心意味。

sentence.Network_en: I shall await your answer to my letter with eagerness.

sentence.Network_cn: 数不清的陷阱等待毫无戒心的投资者.

sentence.Network_en: I shall await you at seven - thirty or thereabouts.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 等字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 等号〖 equal-sign〗 等候〖 wait;await〗 等级〖 grade;rank〗.
须字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 片刻〖 moment〗 等待〖 await〗 停留〖 stay〗.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... avoid vt. 避免，躲开；撤消 await vt. 等候，期待 award n. 奖，奖品；判定.
考研词汇5500 - 豆丁网 ... avoid vt. 防止,避免;逃避,避开 358. await vt. 等候,期待;(事情等)降临于 359. awake a. 醒着的.

3.2.5 等待审核的评论(Awaiting Moderation)这是Wordpress为了防止垃圾评论、广告的骚扰而提供的功能。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Anglo-Norman French awaitier, from a- (from Latin ad- 'to, at') + waitier 'to wait'

entry.def: If you await someone or something, you wait for them.

example.ex: Very little was said as we awaited the arrival of the chairman...
example.tran: 我们等候主席到来的时候都没怎么说话。

example.ex: He's awaiting trial, which is expected to begin early next year.
example.tran: 他在等候审判，预计明年初开始。

entry.tran: 即将发生于；将降临到…身上
entry.def: Something that awaits you is going to happen or come to you in the future.

example.ex: A nasty surprise awaited them in Rosemary Lane.
example.tran: 在罗斯玛丽巷，一起严重的意外事件正等待着他们。

means.word_mean: 1. look forward to the probable occurrence of;

sentences.sentence: "We were expecting a visit from our relatives"

auth_sentence.content: Of course, challenges await us at each destination.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, challenges await us at each destination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, challenges await us at each destination.

auth_sentence.content: Your ill-meaning politician lords...Appointed to await me thirty spies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your ill-meaning politician lords...Appointed to await me thirty spies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your ill-meaning politician lords...Appointed to await me thirty spies.

auth_sentence.content: "Tough decisions await us all," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Tough decisions await us all," he said.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 加在单词前,表示"在……,……的"; 2. 注:加在描述性的动词前面表形容词,常用作表语;加在名词,形容词前构成副词.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+shore岸→adv.向岸地, 在岸上地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在远处, 到远处, 离去
stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+way路→沿着路去了远方

sentences.en: A warm welcome awaits all our customers.
sentences.cn: 对我们所有的顾客准备好热烈的欢迎。

jushi.english: A warm welcome awaits all our guests.
jushi.chinese: 我们的客人都将受到热烈欢迎。
我等候你的进一步指示。

jushi.english: They were awaiting the birth of their first child.
jushi.chinese: 他们等待着他们第一个孩子的降生。
